goals.description: Capture Europe, Australia and one other continent
Capture Europe, South America and one other continent
Capture 18 territories and occupy each with two troops
Destroy all armies of the red player or—if one's own troops are that color—capture 24 territories
Destroy all armies of the yellow player or—if one's own troops are that color—capture 24 territories
Destroy all armies of the green player or—if one's own troops are that color—capture 24 territories
Destroy all armies of the blue player or—if one's own troops are that color—capture 24 territories
Destroy all armies of the black player or—if one's own troops are that color—capture 24 territories
Destroy all armies of the pink player or—if one's own troops are that color—capture 24 territories
